doc:
Ronny Cox https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ronny_Cox 0 Daniel Ronald Cox (born July 23, 1938) is an American actor, singer-songwriter, and storyteller. His best-known roles include Drew Ballinger in Deliverance (1972), George Apple in Apple's Way (1974–75), Lieutenant Andrew Bogomil in Beverly Hills Cop (1984), Richard "Dick" Jones in RoboCop (1987), and Vilos Cohaagen in Total Recall (1990). Cox wrote a book about his experience filming Deliverance for the movie's 40th anniversary in 2012. He plays over 100 shows at festivals and theaters each year with his band. Daniel_Ronald_Cox ( born July_23_,_1938 ) is an_American_actor , singer-songwriter , and storyteller . His_best-known_roles include Drew_Ballinger in Deliverance_(_1972_) , George_Apple in Apple 's_Way_(_1974 – 75_) , Lieutenant_Andrew_Bogomil in Beverly_Hills_Cop_(_1984_) , Richard_"_Dick_"_Jones in RoboCop_(_1987_) , and Vilos_Cohaagen in Total Recall (_1990_) . Cox wrote a_book about his_experience filming Deliverance for the_movie 's_40th_anniversary in 2012 . He plays over_100_shows at festivals_and_theaters each_year with his_band .
